\n\t\tWarrior Too Yoga Short\n\t\t$78\n\.productDescription: This is the yoga short that started Kozm. Lightweight, ultra comfortable, and rugged with a little stretch. Just the necessities – a small back pocket and a simple cotton drawcord. Built for #consciouscombat, this is the Warrior Too.
\n\t\tWarrior Too Yoga Short\n\t\t$78\n\.pageTitle: Warrior Too Yoga Short • Product • Kozm

\n\t\tOriginal Zip Hood\n\t\t$112\n\t.productDescription: The name says it all. The Original Zip is the 3rd of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection and gives the pre practice uniform a serious upgrade. Old school, one-piece hood, modern ghost side pockets and a classic front zip. Modern slim silhouette perfectly cropped right at the waist.

\n\t\tOriginal Zip Hood *Limited\n\t\t$1.productDescription: The name says it all. The Original Zip is the 3rd of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection and gives the pre practice uniform a serious upgrade. Old school, one-piece hood, modern ghost side pockets and a classic front zip. Modern slim silhouette perfectly cropped right at the waist.

\n\t\tKozm Crew\n\t\t$89\n\t.productDescription: The Kozm crew is an instant classic and is the 2nd of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection. Raglan cut sleeves, a slightly more open & stylish neck opening and a modern slim (not skinny) fit all around. Thumbholes at the cuffs, and a vintage-inspired cropped waist. Dressing down never looked so good.

\n\t\tNo Slack Pant\n\t\t$98\n\t.productDescription: A chino cut inspired “sweat pant” which is the 1st of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons) French Terry collection. It’s slim fitting, with enough room at the hips, and tapered at the ankles with a chino pant hem (no sport elastic here), these pants make looking sharp more comfortable than ever.

\n\t\tWild in the Streets Short\n\t\t$88.productDescription: This is a comfortable fit that says, “style matters.” The 4th of 4 styles in our A|S (All Seasons French Terry) collection, it is slim at the thighs, cut above the knees, with some room at the hips and a sewn performance gusset. These are definitely not your brother-in-law’s basketball shorts. Perfect for before/after your practice. Heck, even during.
\n\t\tWild in the Streets Short\n\t\t$88.pageTitle: Wild in the Streets Short • Product • Kozm

\n\t\tBaja Hoodie\n\t\t$84\n\t.productDescription: This woven hemp/recycled PET blend has a lightweight hand with a smooth finish. Inspired by the ponchos we grew up wearing on Baja trips, updated with Kozm design, this pullover hides the grime on your tee and provides a light layer when the sun is scarce. Pouch pockets, drawcord hood and hem, no zip.

\n\t\tSmithereen Beanie\n\t\t$32\n\t.productDescription: A classic fit, intended to be worn with a proper fold and more early am surf check than Antarctic survival mission, our beanies keep head chi in while you’re warming up. Custom crafted and knit to perfection — this lightweight beanie will go with you everywhere.
